programme.title: Guaraní (PAR) vs Juventud (URU) - Copa Libertadores 2026 - Phase 2 - 2nd Leg

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Aston Villa - English Premier League
programme.desc: Wolves have won four of their last six Premier League home games against Aston Villa and are unbeaten in four since a 1-0 loss in December 2020. Aston Villa have won three of their last four Premier League games against Wolves, as many as in their previous 15. They’re looking to complete the Premier League double over them for the first time since 2003-04.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Sunderland - English Premier League
programme.desc: Bournemouth have lost three of their four home league games against Sunderland, with the exception being a 2-0 victory in September 2015. Following their 3-2 victory in November, Sunderland are looking to complete their second league double over Bournemouth, after the 1989-90 second tier campaign.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Sunderland - English Premier League
programme.desc: Bournemouth have lost three of their four home league games against Sunderland, with the exception being a 2-0 victory in September 2015. Following their 3-2 victory in November, Sunderland are looking to complete their second league double over Bournemouth, after the 1989-90 second tier campaign.

programme.title: Liverpool vs West Ham United - English Premier League
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 19 Premier League games against West Ham, winning seven of the last eight since a 3-2 away loss in November 2021. West Ham have won just one of their last 52 away league games against Liverpool, beating them 3-0 in August 2015 under Slaven Bilic.

programme.title: Liverpool vs West Ham United - English Premier League
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 19 Premier League games against West Ham, winning seven of the last eight since a 3-2 away loss in November 2021. West Ham have won just one of their last 52 away league games against Liverpool, beating them 3-0 in August 2015 under Slaven Bilic.

programme.title: Leeds United vs Manchester City - English Premier League
programme.desc: Leeds have lost each of their last five Premier League games against Man City, having lost just four of their first 16 against them in the competition. Man City have won their last two away league games against Leeds – only once have they won three consecutively, doing so in their first three visits to Elland Road between 1924 and 1928.

programme.title: FIFA World Cup 2026 Stories From The Cities | E8 Philadelphia
programme.desc: 16-Episode Series offering a cinematic exploration of the "soccer soul" of each FIFA World Cup 2026 host city. Uncover the cultural, grassroots, and community dimensions of football across North America.

programme.title: EN Spirit of Sport Series 11 | E3
programme.desc: This month on Spirit of Sport, Real Madrid and England footballer Jude Bellingham takes us back to the start of his journey in Birmingham and opens up about his mental health. Ahead of the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina, freestyle skier Eileen Gu reflects on her journey to gold. Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar and tennis icon Novak Djokovic spotlight the transformative power of sport and how they’re using their platforms to give back. England Lioness Georgia Stanway visits a special football project in London to inspire the next generation.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Levante - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: FC Barcelona have won all 16 of their home games against Levante UD in LaLiga, a record of 100% home wins against the same opponent in the competition's history. Levante UD have registered points in three of their last ten LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, all three coming at the Ciutat de València, despite losing 18 of their previous 23 encounters in the competition.

programme.title: Osasuna vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Osasuna have not won any of their last 21 games against Real Madrid in LaLiga since a 1-0 victory in January 2011 with José Antonio Camacho as coach, their longest winless streak against a single opponent in the competition's history. Real Madrid are unbeaten in their last 10 LaLiga games at El Sadar against Osasuna, equalling the best unbeaten run by a visiting team at the hosts' ground in the competition's entire history, set by FC Barcelona between 1985 and 1993.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Aston Villa - English Premier League
programme.desc: Wolves have won four of their last six Premier League home games against Aston Villa and are unbeaten in four since a 1-0 loss in December 2020. Aston Villa have won three of their last four Premier League games against Wolves, as many as in their previous 15. They’re looking to complete the Premier League double over them for the first time since 2003-04.

programme.title: Growing through Sports
programme.desc: This documentary tells the stories of four young people from four different continents through their experience with sport.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Aston Villa - English Premier League
programme.desc: Aston Villa striker Tammy Abraham has scored more goals against Wolves than any other opponent in English league football, netting a hat-trick in his first Premier League game against them with Chelsea in September 2019. No Wolves player has scored more than twice so far in the Premier League this season. With 27 games played, it’s the latest into a season a team has had to wait for a player to score at least three goals, overtaking Southampton from last season.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Sunderland - English Premier League
programme.desc: Bournemouth have lost three of their four home league games against Sunderland, with the exception being a 2-0 victory in September 2015. Following their 3-2 victory in November, Sunderland are looking to complete their second league double over Bournemouth, after the 1989-90 second tier campaign.

programme.title: Liverpool vs West Ham United - English Premier League
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 19 Premier League games against West Ham, winning seven of the last eight since a 3-2 away loss in November 2021. West Ham have won just one of their last 52 away league games against Liverpool, beating them 3-0 in August 2015 under Slaven Bilic.

programme.title: Leeds United vs Manchester City - English Premier League
programme.desc: Leeds have lost each of their last five Premier League games against Man City, having lost just four of their first 16 against them in the competition. Man City have won their last two away league games against Leeds – only once have they won three consecutively, doing so in their first three visits to Elland Road between 1924 and 1928.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Phil Foden has been involved in 99 Premier League goals and could be the sixth Man City player to 100 goal involvements. He would be the 18th youngest player to this milestone overall, and second youngest for Man City behind Erling Haaland. Harvey Barnes scored both of Newcastle’s goals in their 2-1 win over Man City in the reverse fixture. The last Magpies player to score home and away against the Citizens in the same league season was Alan Shearer in 2004-05.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Arsenal have won six of their last seven Premier League games against Spurs, including each of the last four. They last won five league games in a row against them between January 1987 and January 1989. Spurs have lost their last three Premier League home games against Arsenal, as many as they had in their previous 23. They last lost four in a row against them between 1952 and 1955.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Levante - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: FC Barcelona have won all 16 of their home games against Levante UD in LaLiga, a record of 100% home wins against the same opponent in the competition's history. Levante UD have registered points in three of their last ten LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, all three coming at the Ciutat de València, despite losing 18 of their previous 23 encounters in the competition.

programme.title: Osasuna vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Osasuna have not won any of their last 21 games against Real Madrid in LaLiga since a 1-0 victory in January 2011 with José Antonio Camacho as coach, their longest winless streak against a single opponent in the competition's history. Real Madrid are unbeaten in their last 10 LaLiga games at El Sadar against Osasuna, equalling the best unbeaten run by a visiting team at the hosts' ground in the competition's entire history, set by FC Barcelona between 1985 and 1993.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Aston Villa - English Premier League
programme.desc: Wolves have won four of their last six Premier League home games against Aston Villa and are unbeaten in four since a 1-0 loss in December 2020. Aston Villa have won three of their last four Premier League games against Wolves, as many as in their previous 15. They’re looking to complete the Premier League double over them for the first time since 2003-04.

programme.title: Growing through Sports
programme.desc: This documentary tells the stories of four young people from four different continents through their experience with sport.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Aston Villa - English Premier League
programme.desc: Aston Villa striker Tammy Abraham has scored more goals against Wolves than any other opponent in English league football, netting a hat-trick in his first Premier League game against them with Chelsea in September 2019. No Wolves player has scored more than twice so far in the Premier League this season. With 27 games played, it’s the latest into a season a team has had to wait for a player to score at least three goals, overtaking Southampton from last season.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Sunderland - English Premier League
programme.desc: Bournemouth have lost three of their four home league games against Sunderland, with the exception being a 2-0 victory in September 2015. Following their 3-2 victory in November, Sunderland are looking to complete their second league double over Bournemouth, after the 1989-90 second tier campaign.

programme.title: Liverpool vs West Ham United - English Premier League
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 19 Premier League games against West Ham, winning seven of the last eight since a 3-2 away loss in November 2021. West Ham have won just one of their last 52 away league games against Liverpool, beating them 3-0 in August 2015 under Slaven Bilic.

programme.title: Leeds United vs Manchester City - English Premier League
programme.desc: Leeds have lost each of their last five Premier League games against Man City, having lost just four of their first 16 against them in the competition. Man City have won their last two away league games against Leeds – only once have they won three consecutively, doing so in their first three visits to Elland Road between 1924 and 1928.

programme.title: Deportivo Alaves vs Girona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Deportivo Alavés have won just one of their last five LaLiga encounters against Girona FC, a 1-0 away victory in April 2025. After five consecutive home victories in all competitions against Girona between 1957 and 2008, Alavés have only won two of their last eight home matches against them, a 1-0 win in the Segunda División in November 2015 and a 2-1 win in LaLiga in May 2019.

programme.title: Osasuna vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Osasuna have not won any of their last 21 games against Real Madrid in LaLiga since a 1-0 victory in January 2011 with José Antonio Camacho as coach, their longest winless streak against a single opponent in the competition's history. Real Madrid are unbeaten in their last 10 LaLiga games at El Sadar against Osasuna, equalling the best unbeaten run by a visiting team at the hosts' ground in the competition's entire history, set by FC Barcelona between 1985 and 1993.

programme.title: Osasuna vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 25
programme.desc: Osasuna have not won any of their last 21 games against Real Madrid in LaLiga since a 1-0 victory in January 2011 with José Antonio Camacho as coach, their longest winless streak against a single opponent in the competition's history. Real Madrid are unbeaten in their last 10 LaLiga games at El Sadar against Osasuna, equalling the best unbeaten run by a visiting team at the hosts' ground in the competition's entire history, set by FC Barcelona between 1985 and 1993.

programme.title: Levante vs Alavés - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 26
programme.desc: Levante have won just two of their 11 LaLiga matches against Deportivo Alavés - both of those came at home, while they have conceded at least one goal in all 11 encounters. Levante lost their last home game against Deportivo Alavés, 0-1 in June 2023 in the second leg of the promotion play-off final to LaLiga, having previously been unbeaten in their three prior home games against them at the Ciutat de Valencia.

programme.title: Nice vs Lorient - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 23

programme.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Athletic Club - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 26
programme.desc: Rayo Vallecano have not won any of their last eight LaLiga matches against Athletic Club, while losing each of the last five - their longest losing streak against them in the competition. Rayo Vallecano are currently on their longest winless streak at home against Athletic Club in LaLiga, with their last victory coming in a 2-1 win in September 2014, when Paco Jémez was manager for Rayo and Ernesto Valverde in charge of Athletic Club.

programme.title: Rennes vs Toulouse - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 24
programme.desc: Rennes have won 37 Ligue 1 games against Toulouse, only managing more top-flight wins against Strasbourg. However, Rennes are currently on a six-game winless run against Toulouse in the top-flight. Rennes have lost just 16% of their home games against Toulouse in Ligue 1, their lowest percentage against an opponent they have faced at least 25 times at home. However, Rennes have been beaten in their two most recent such encounters.

programme.title: Lamine Yamal - The Future Of Football

programme.title: Chambery vs Montpellier - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League round of 16, Quarter-final and Semi-final draws
programme.desc: The UEFA Champions League knockout draw will determine the round of 16 matchups and set the full bracket through to the semi-finals, outlining each team’s potential path to the final. Under the new 36-team league phase format, the top eight teams qualify directly for the round of 16, while teams ranked 9th to 24th compete in knockout play-offs for the remaining spots, making the draw a key moment in shaping the rest of the competition.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League round of 16, Quarter-final and Semi-final draws
programme.desc: The UEFA Champions League knockout draw will determine the round of 16 matchups and set the full bracket through to the semi-finals, outlining each team’s potential path to the final. Under the new 36-team league phase format, the top eight teams qualify directly for the round of 16, while teams ranked 9th to 24th compete in knockout play-offs for the remaining spots, making the draw a key moment in shaping the rest of the competition.

programme.title: UEFA Europa League round of 16, Quarter-final and Semi-final draws
programme.desc: The UEFA Europa League knockout draw will map out the decisive stage of the tournament, confirming the round of 16 ties and establishing the full bracket through to the semi-finals. With the eight league-phase leaders joined by the eight play-off winners, the ceremony sets the competitive pathway to the final, giving clubs clarity on their potential route to European silverware.

programme.title: UEFA Europa League round of 16, Quarter-final and Semi-final draws

With the eight league-phase leaders joined by the eight play-off winners, the ceremony sets the competitive pathway to the final, giving clubs clarity on their potential route to European silverware.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League round of 16, Quarter-final and Semi-final draws
programme.desc: In the UEFA Conference League, the knockout-stage draw defines the decisive roadmap of the tournament. It pairs the 16 remaining clubs in the round of 16 and simultaneously locks in the quarter-final and semi-final bracket, giving teams and fans a clear view of the potential route to the trophy. With league-phase leaders joined by play-off winners, the draw marks the moment when the competition shifts fully into high-stakes elimination football.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Paris vs Montpellier - Marmara Spike ligue Volleyball - 2025
programme.desc: France’s top men’s volleyball competition, the LNV Ligue A Masculine (Marmara SpikeLigue), delivers a season of elite clubs battling through a home-and-away league before the playoffs. Expect big serving, quick middle attacks, and high-level defense as teams chase points, seeding and the national title in a prime-time French showcase.
